annotations.description: Today's cocktail is an original of mine, a nice take on a daiquiri featuring the savory sweetness of Mango. With sustainability always in mind these days I a...
annotations.title: A Hummingbird, Sustainability and You

textContent:
2oz (60ml) Flor De Cana Rum (or other White Rum)
.75oz (22.5ml) Lemon Juice
.375oz (11.5ml) Honey Syrup
.375oz (11.5ml) Mango Syrup
Mango Fruit Leather Garnish [optional]

Shake and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sr_y42VKL8I
title: Hummingbird
